name: notas-voz-resumen-acciones
description: Aplicación para convertir audios en transcripciones, resúmenes y acciones

scripts.contracts:test: start-server-and-test 'node mocks/server.js' http://127.0.0.1:5000 'pnpm --filter @notas-voz/backend test:contract --reporter json --output qa/artifacts/contracts-report.json'
scripts.sdk:generate: openapi-generator-cli generate -i contracts/openapi.yaml -o packages/sdk -g typescript-fetch --additional-properties=supportsES6=true,modelPropertyNaming=camelCase || echo 'sdk placeholder'
scripts.e2e:ci: start-server-and-test 'concurrently "node apps/backend/dist/index.js" "bash -lc 'NEXT_PUBLIC_USE_MOCKS=true NEXT_PUBLIC_API_BASE=/api/v1 pnpm --filter @notas-voz/frontend start'"' http://127.0.0.1:3000 'playwright test --reporter=line,html --output=qa/artifacts/e2e'
scripts.setup: pnpm install && pnpm contracts:check && pnpm sdk:generate
scripts.ci: pnpm typecheck && pnpm lint && pnpm build && pnpm test

author: Tu equipo
